text: Gerrit Borghuis (7 December 1939 – 27 September 2022) was a Dutch footballer.Met overlijden Otto Roffel (95) en Gerrit Borghuis (82) raakt voetbalwereld twee GVAV'ers kwijt Borghuis was a midfielder. He played six international matches for under-19 national team. Borghuis played 154 matches for GVAV between 1958 and 1963. He later also played with Go Ahead Eagles, Heracles Almelo, DWS, Kansas City Spurs and PEC Zwolle.Voormalig PEC, GA Eagles en Heracles-voetballer Gerrit Borghuis (82) overleden, RTV Oost, 28 September 2022 Borghuis was the grandson of footballer Maarten Pouwels.Pouwels in voetsporen van opa Borghuis en René Eijkelkamp, De Stentor, 11 July 2018 Borghuis died in September of 2022, aged 82.Otto Roffel en Gerrit Borghuis, voormalige profs van GVAV, overleden, oogtv.nl, 4 October 2022 ==References== Category:1939 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Dutch footballers Category:Sportspeople from Groningen (city)
title: Gerrit Borghuis
